name: Buttercup: The last cookie
description:
Help buttercup uncover the secrets of the fridge!

Buttercup will slash, dash and "egg" her way through the dangerous fridge while meeting a few friends and facing against a fierce foe!

ControlsAbilityA,DMove
SDrop down platformSpaceJumpLAttackQEgg (Projectile);Suger (Dash)

Have fun! Sorry for not adding any music this time.
